description.translate: Here, there is no greater quality, because	the coldness does not exempt from ardour.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Cœur de marbre\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Ici, il n'est de plus grande qualité,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7car le froid n'exempte pas de fougue.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Here, there is no greater quality, because\"}","{\"text\":\"§7the coldness does not exempt from ardour.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a2 §7DAR§a2 §7SPD§c-2\"}"]}}
